Navigate to 'https://example.com/products/pro101'
Verify the product image 'main_product.jpg' is loaded within 500ms, has natural dimensions 800x600px, rendered dimensions 400x300px, and alt text 'Stylish Leather Bag'
Verify the product title text 'Luxury Leather Handbag' has font size 28px, font family 'Roboto', font weight 700, color #333333, and is text align 'center'
Navigate to 'https://example.com/login'
Verify the 'Username' input field has placeholder 'Enter your username', padding 12px 15px, border 1px solid #cccccc, and is not focused
Verify the 'Login' button is enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, border radius 4px, width 150px, and its top margin is 20px
After loading 'https://example.com/'
Verify the 'Home' link is visible, has text 'Home', color #333333, and a height of 48px
Verify the 'Home' link on hover, its background color changes to #e9ecef within a 200ms transition
Verify the 'Home' link has a bottom margin of 0px
Verify 'About Us' link has aria-label 'About the company', font family 'Arial', and font weight 400
Verify the cart icon displays item count 3
Verify the 'Total' price text has color #dc3545, font weight 600, and font size 22px
Verify the 'Checkout' button is visible, has a width of 200px, height 45px, background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, is aligned 'right', and positioned at y coordinate 500px
Verify the 'Play' button has a width of 40px, height 40px, is visible, has a shape of 'circle', and background color #000000
Verify the video is not muted
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is not active
Verify the current video value is 00:00:00
Verify the volume slider has an opacity of 0.8 and its label is 'Volume'
Search for 'laptops'
Verify the results page displays exactly 10 items
Verify each item's price text has font size 18px, color #007bff, and font weight 500
Verify the first item image is loaded, has a rendered width of 200px, height 150px, a border 1px solid #eeeeee, is located at x coordinate 50px, and has padding 10px
After making changes on the profile settings page

Verify the 'Save Changes' button becomes enabled, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, padding 10px 20px, border radius 3px, left position 100px from the viewport edge, width 160px, font size 15px, and font family 'Verdana'
Click 'Delete Account'
Verify the confirmation modal dialog becomes visible, covers the full viewport width, and has a background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5) for the overlay
Verify the 'Confirm' button has text 'Confirm Deletion', color #ffffff, font weight 700, height 50px, and a margin-top of 20px

Verify the 'Next' arrow button has a width of 30px, height 50px, border 1px solid #ffffff, is located at x coordinate 950px relative to its container, has an opacity of 0.9, background color rgba(0,0,0,0.6), and a border radius of 50%
Verify the currently displayed image source is 'photo_01.jpg'
Upon submitting an invalid email
Verify the error message 'Please enter a valid email address.' appears below the email input field, has text color #dc3545, font size 14px, font family 'Georgia', and a margin-top of 8px
Verify the email input field border color changes to #dc3545 and its bottom padding is 5px
When opening the date picker
Verify the current date '2023-10-26' is selected, highlighted with background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify the calendar grid has a border 1px solid #cccccc, width 300px, and height 280px
Verify the calendar grid's 'Next Month' button is visible
Verify the 'Today' button has font weight 500 and a top margin of 10px
Click the 'Language' dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, displays 5 language options, and each option has a padding of 10px 15px
Verify the 'English' option is active, has background color #f8f9fa, font weight 600, and color #333333
Verify the dropdown menu's top position is 50px relative to its trigger and its width is 180px

Verify the progress bar displays value 75%, has a width of 300px, height 20px, background color #007bff for the filled portion, border radius 5px, text 'Uploading...', text color #ffffff, font size 14px, text align 'center', and a left margin of 10px
Click the 'Name' column header in a data table
Verify the header becomes active, has background color #e9ecef, its text 'Name' has font weight 700, top padding 10px, font size 16px, and a right border 1px solid #dddddd
Verify a sort icon is visible next to 'Name'
Verify the column data is sorted alphabetically
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible within 100ms, displays text 'Need assistance?', has a background color #333333, text color #ffffff, border radius 3px, left position 20px relative to the icon, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, and opacity 0.95
Scroll down the page by 500px
Verify the header remains visible and sticky, positioned at top 0px, has a background color #ffffff, height 60px, width 100%, border-bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0, and padding 10px 20px
Verify scroll-top value is 500px

Verify a placeholder image with source 'placeholder.svg' is visible, has rendered dimensions 300x200px, alt text 'Loading image...', background color #f0f0f0, border 1px dashed #cccccc, opacity 0.8, and a margin-bottom of 15px
Verify the actual image is not loaded
Verify the 'Successfully saved!' notification banner is visible, has a background color #d4edda, text color #155724, and padding 15px
Click the 'x' dismiss icon
Verify the banner becomes hidden within a 300ms transition, has an animation named 'fadeOut', border radius 5px, and its right position is 20px from the viewport edge
Verify the 'Choose File' button is enabled, has text 'Choose File', font size 14px, and a width of 100px
Verify the associated file count displays 0
Verify the input field's placeholder is 'No file chosen', its font family is 'Arial', its height is 38px, and has a border 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the 'Google Maps' watermark is visible at the bottom right corner, has an opacity of 0.7, a font size of 10px, and color #555555
Verify the current zoom value is 12
Verify the map's width is 100%, height is 600px, is not muted, and has a border radius of 8px
